Docs.summary: Implements the UidManager task. Use the UidManager element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [UidManager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4fc7b5a5-11b0-46ca-9656-8c2a0b08d1fe).
